entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:36 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 07:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -40.3°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
